title: Elon Musk’s X removes New York Times’ verification badge
description: The gold badge was the only symbol distinguishing the Times’ 55-million-follower account from impostors amid two major global conflicts.

title: Families of Israeli hostages held by Hamas cling to digital clues
description: Hamas’s decision to film its rampage has deepened the anguish of Israelis, but it has also given intelligence experts clues about where hostages are being held.

title: Lawmakers demand answers from Bezos about election misinformation on Alexa
description: Lawmakers cited a Post report that found Alexa spread false claims that the 2020 election was stolen.

title: Death by a thousand meetings: How to reduce video-call overload
description: Years into the pandemic, white-collar workers are still suffering from back-to-back video calls. Experts provide tips on how to rethink meetings.

title: India uses widespread internet blackouts to mask domestic turmoil
description: Indian officials say tactic is needed to combat unrest and prevent the spread of online rumors. But critics say the measures, more extensive than in any other country, stifle dissent, cover up abuses and impose a heavy toll on ordinary citizens.
